subject: Photography
title: Candid vs. Posed Portraits
description: A short lesson to help you apply Candid vs. Posed Portraits.

hook.text: A posed smile or a stolen laugh? The debate between candid and posed portraiture never ends.

buildup.text: Posed portraits give the photographer control over expression, lighting, and composition. Everything is deliberate.

discovery.text: Candid portraits capture unguarded moments â€” genuine laughter, deep thought, spontaneous emotion.

twist.text: The best portrait photographers blur the line: they create a relaxed environment where posed subjects act candid.

climax.text: The goal isn't candid or posed â€” it's authentic. The method that reveals truth is the right method.

punchline.text: The best posed portrait looks candid. The best candid looks composed.

quiz.question: What is the ultimate goal of both candid and posed portraits?
options: To capture an authentic expression of the subject
